thought: To craft a golden shovel, I need to craft a gold ingot first. I have a gold block at slot 28 which can be crafted into 9 gold ingots, so I will move it to the crafting grid at slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 28 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 1 with quantity 1
